name: SurgeryIntegumentarySystemBreast
title: Surgery Integumentary System Breast
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT codes associated with Surgery Integumentary System Breast.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with Surgery Integumentary System Breast.),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes associated with Surgery Integumentary System Breast are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with Surgery Integumentary System Breast are excluded from this value set. Codes captured in systems other than CPT are also excluded from the value set.)
